def_cn: (持共同态度或信仰的人的)大本营，据点
def_en: If you say that a place or region is a stronghold of a particular attitude or belief, you mean that most people there share this attitude or belief.

def_cn: (某种动物的)主要栖息地
def_en: If you say that a place is a stronghold of a particular type of animal, you mean that more of that type of animal live there than in other places.
